divs: Sighting Detailsi was standing on my back porch of my apartment,i had bean standing for a minute fixing to call a friend.i noticed something shying and moving super fast.i got a real good look i had my glasses on , after a second or two it stopped and made a sharp right turn i got author good look and i was no plane.after i called my friend and told him. thank you
